text: This restaurant was a mess the manager was loud unruly. And the pizza was dry The edge of the pizza was broken. In three different places it was not like the other pizza hut I want go back to this pizza hut any more I should have call the district manager. Still might.

name: Willette Lowery
text: You don't deserve a whole star, all of these places in Charlotte NC, and they can't deliver to your area, that's some bull, what's the use in having delivery and you only deliver to certain area, i mean everyone doesn't have a car. Y'all need to be better with your delivery service.

name: Kimberly Long
text: The first & last time I come to this location. The food was cold and the wait was extremely long...why? Because the staff was too busy gossiping.  The only reason I didn't give one star is because I saw one lone employee who seemed to be doing EVERYONE'S job. I won't be back.
